title: [The Black Rose, Amidships]
description: The golvern-edged propellers of the ship shine in the sunlight, casting a wavering blur of reflected radiance over the smooth-worn and polished planes of wood below.  Fanciful tracery forms golden vines up the trio of cylindrical supports leading up to the whirring blades.  A burled cherrywood hatch fastened with a black iron ring lies at the center of a hollow formed by the supports.
room.location: The Black Rose, inside the elven fortress of Ta'Vaalor
